controls.name: min
controls.description: Every element in the matrix, which is <min, is changed to min. If "min" is not set (an empty string), it is considered to be −∞ (not checked).

controls.name: max
controls.description: Every element in the matrix, which is >max, is changed to max. If "max" is not set (an empty string), it is considered to be +∞ (not checked).
